Package org.hibernate.validator

Interface PredefinedScopeHibernateValidatorFactory

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, HibernateValidatorFactory, ValidatorFactory
All Known Implementing Classes:
PredefinedScopeValidatorFactoryImpl
@Incubating public interface PredefinedScopeHibernateValidatorFactory extends HibernateValidatorFactory
Provides Hibernate Validator extensions to ValidatorFactory in the context of a predefined scope.
Since:
6.1
